Uses of Class
meico.mpm.elements.Performance

  • Packages that use Performance 
    Package Description
    meico.mei
    Contains the MEI class and a Helper class that is mostly used for MEI processing but offers some useful functionality also for other datatypes such as MSM and MPM.
    meico.mpm
    This package holds the official Music Performance Markup API.
    meico.mpm.elements
    Contains the classes for all MPM elements.
    meico.msm
    Contains classes to handle Musical Sequence Markup data.
    meico.musicxml
    Contains classes to interface MusicXML data.

    • Uses of Performance in meico.mpm

      Fields in meico.mpm with type parameters of type Performance 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Performance> Mpm.performances 
      Methods in meico.mpm that return Performance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Performance Mpm.addPerformance(java.lang.String name)
      generate a performance and add it to this mpm, but caution: if another performance with the same name exists already in this mpm, accessing it via getPerformance(name) will return only the first in the list
      Performance Mpm.getPerformance(int i)
      access a performance by index
      Performance Mpm.getPerformance(java.lang.String name)
      Get a performance by name.
      Methods in meico.mpm that return types with arguments of type Performance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Performance> Mpm.getAllPerformances()
      this returns all performances in this mpm as an ArrayList
      Methods in meico.mpm with parameters of type Performance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Mpm.addPerformance(Performance performance)
      add a performance to this mpm, but caution: if another performance with the same name exists already in this mpm, accessing it via getPerformance(name) will return only the first in the list
      void Mpm.removePerformance(Performance performance)
      remove the specified performance from this mpm
